title: Donhero
author: Donhero
content: Need $200 converted to western union at best rate possible.Escrow.Looking for trusted members only

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Try localcryptos, you will get good offers for a cheap price, unfortunately the money will be sent from some African countries, but if you want from Europe, the price difference may be about 5%. Generally, search and you will find some options.Other alternative:Localbitcoins/paxful if you are ready for KYCI used bestchange to find this exchange https://bitcash.cc/en/exchange_BTC_to_Western_union/ do your own research Some scam (newbie accounts) may contact you, so be careful.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: I'd suggest another way to receive your money, Western Union will take a good chunk out of that.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.created_time: June 22, 2022, 04:44:15 PMLast edit: June 24, 2022, 01:10:30 AM by DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Donhero on June 21, 2022, 10:31:08 PMNeed $200 converted to western union at best rate possible.Western Union isn't great for the sender, they'll charge substantial fees.  If you're willing to take the hit for the fees, then you're more likely to get someone to take your offer.  Like me, for example.  I have a Western Union account, and I would take this offer if you are willing to send first and cover the fees.I can also send via Zelle or Revolute, neither of which charge fees.Just to touch on the subject of p2p exchanges, I recommend Bisq.ETA: got my fix on bisq.

comments.author: COINAMITE
comments.body: Hi @DonheroI can easily take this off you. I would accept using an escrow, any you'd like! As long you pay the fees for the escrow + western union fees. Other than that I'll pay the current rate

comments.author: LDU QUITO
comments.body: Try to use it from the trusted platform like Binance 100% recommended
